name: Startographer
description:
Using your ship, The Aratus VII, you fly from star to star and create constellations.

Contols

W - Forward

S - Backwards

A - Left

D - Right

Q - Rotate Counter-Clockwise

E - Rotate Clockwise

Shift - Move up

Ctrl - Move down

Space - Deploy satellite and make connection (if in range)

Hold F - Enter hyperspeed
